programme.title: Jimmy Carter is nominated for re-election
programme.short_synopsis: Edward Kennedy makes the best speech of his career at the Democratic Party conference.
programme.medium_synopsis: Edward Kennedy makes the best speech of his career at the Democratic Party conference, after losing his challenge for the party's nomination to incumbent President Jimmy Carter.
